document.forum_title: Latest Press Releases News on One News Page
document.discussion_title: Fitch Withdraws Ratings on Certain U.S. Municipal Bond Maturities
document.topic_text: Fitch Withdraws Ratings on Certain U.S. Municipal Bond Maturities Monday, 25 April 2016 ( 13 minutes ago ) NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Fitch Ratings has withdrawn its ratings for the following bonds due to prerefunding activity: --Los Angeles Convention & Exhibition Center Authority (CA) lease revenue refunding bonds series 2008A (prerefunded maturities only). The updated rating history for the above maturities is now reflected on Fitch's web site at 'www.fitchratings.com'. Additional information is available at 'www.fitchratings.com'. Additional Disclosures Solicitation Status https://www.fitchr
